Class ListWeapon

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.umlv.escape.weapon.ListWeapon

  • public class ListWeapon
extends java.lang.Object
    Represent all the Ship's Weapons and his current Weapon

      • setCurrentWeapon

        public boolean setCurrentWeapon(java.lang.String w)

        Parameters:
        w - to set in current
        Returns:
        true if weapon become current

      • setNextWeapon

        public void setNextWeapon()
